channel.title: Can I stop a cheat engine from running on my server?
channel.description:
Hello moparscape community!
Here's my problem: I have a PI ErasedPkz base server and people can use cheat engine to dupe through the dueling arena and general store. I would rather not disable the dueling arena or remove the general store, so I was checking to make sure if anybody knew of a script to close Cheat Engine each time a player opens or has it open with my server process running.
Is there a way to run a script in everybody's run.exe for my server that will close the cheat engine process when the client starts?

item.title: Can I stop a cheat engine from running on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Pkor159 Pkor159
item.description:
@Pkor159 wrote:

I’m using the same source but the dupe doesn’t work. Hmm

Read full topic
item.source: Can I stop a cheat engine from running on my server?

item.title: Can I stop a cheat engine from running on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Sibor Sibor
item.description:
@Sibor wrote:

Host Gushers:

Search around next time: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/348729-pi-anti-cheat-client-securities.html

Alright, sorry but thank-you for finding that for me.

Read full topic
